text: As her story told I did surprise a crowd in Austin at Sxsw where I appeared on stage with my then assistant side stage and sang a few songs. What this person did not know was that I attended that show with my then gf Selena Gomez

label: human
text: In the past 24 hours a new Twitter appeared that told a story of myself involved with sexual abuse on March 9, 2014 in Austin Texas at the Four seasons hotel. I want to be clear. There is no truth to this story. In fact as I will soon show I was never present at that location.

label: human
text: Rumors are rumors but sexual abuse is something I don’t take lightly. I wanted to speak out right away but out of respect to so many victims who deal with these issues daily I wanted to make sure I gathered the facts before I made any statement.

label: human
text: I don’t normally address things as I have dealt with random accusations my entire career but after talking with my wife and team I have decided to speak up on an issue tonight.

Objective of National Education Policy 2020 is to bring in a huge transformational change in the Indian Education system through holistic and multidisciplinary approaches.
Focus on different aspects will lead to the overall development of the children across the country. #NEP2020

label: human
text: #NEP2020 will also have the provision of academic credit bank, increased investment in education system, internationalism of education, special education zone for disadvantaged regions, upgradation of KGBV’s to 12 grade and an increased focus on Lok Vidya & the use of technology.

label: human
text: #NEP2020 brings in various features like 5+3+3+4 system in school education, introduction of new 4-year courses, single point common regulatory system, fee fixation & common norms within board regulatory framework; along with multiple entry & exit points in higher education.

label: human
text: Modi govt’s #NEP2020 ensures that quality education will reach students of every section of the society, a special joint task force will be constituted to ensure the same. To increase the Gross Enrolment Ratio (GER) in higher education, continuous & strategic steps will be taken.

text: Supplication is one of the best cures for diseases of the heart. Communicate with your heart & soul. Get close to the Almighty. He will grant comfort. Don’t search for happiness in a place where you will not find it. Know that true happiness comes from Him and it lasts forever.

label: human
text: Sometimes the Almighty sends you blessings disguised in what you see as ugly packages. He wants to see your response. Will you give thanks & embrace the whole process or judge it at face value & react adversely to it? Don’t lose the plot. Don’t let Satan make you ungrateful!

label: human
text: The trials that come your way can make you better or bitter. They can make you grow up or give up. The Almighty’s watching your response. Have you got what it takes to go through tough trials? Will you bear good patience with a soft heart or will your heart harden in the process?

label: human
text: Do you keep going round in circles? Do you feel like you’re moving but not making any progress? Then you have to stop doing what you’re doing & take stock of your life. Reevaluate your priorities & shift your mindset. Get out of the rut. Seek your strength from the Almighty.

label: human
text: Don’t let your fears and worries crush you. Never feel alone in your internal panic. The Almighty knows every single thing about you. Keep asking Him. Keep confiding in Him. Let go of the worry that’s gripping you. Let Him take over and feel a sense of calm restored in you!

label: human
text: What is this life but a series of obstacles? The good news is nothing happens without the Almighty’s Will. If anything unpleasant comes into your life, it had to get approval from Him. He knows the kind of test you need. He’s placed a blessing inside of it. It’s for your good!

label: human
text: Life can be difficult if all you see is everything that’s wrong. Start focusing on what’s right, what’s good, what’s constructive. No matter what you’re facing, if you choose a positive mindset, you’ll emerge the winner. So if you want to feel better, you’ve got to think better!

label: human
text: Stop investing in your past. It’s over. Let it go. The Almighty has paved a way for you to move forward. Don’t be so engrossed with what was & what has been that you forget to acknowledge His Blessing for what is & what’s to come. Read the signs & make that change to your life!

label: human
text: If your heart is not in the right place, you’ll never feel at ease. Purify your intenion in everything that you do. In this age of social media it’s easy to show off, get carried away & thrive on exaggerated needs for acceptance & validation. Protect your heart at all times.

label: human
text: The Almighty is the Controller of Hearts. He can change things in the blink of an eye. Don’t forget! He can heal what has been hurting for years in a flash. He can forgive as He wills. Nothing is beyond the Lord of the Worlds. Have faith that things will work out in the end.

label: human
text: Pay heed to whatever comes out of your mouth. Every word you utter matters. It really does. You may not think so but trust me when I say that the power of words is immense. It can make you or break you. It has the ability to change someone’s life! Choose your words carefully!

label: human
text: Man is always comparing. We often feel the other person is in a much better state than we are. Instead of accepting & appreciating what we have, we always find a way to look at what others have. Be wary. In trying to achieve something better, one may end up losing what one has!

label: human
text: Don’t worry about how people act. That’s on them not you. Always choose kindness, that’s under your control. Spread it far and wide, whichever way you can, even if it means giving a smile or a word of encouragement. Never underestimate how contagious being kind can be!

label: human
text: Learn to see the best in people. Believe the best about them too. No matter how much you disagree, try to find common ground. Spread peace. Quit fighting and bickering. Build bridges. Don’t hate. Don’t look down on anyone. Life’s too short to be doing otherwise.

label: human
text: Quit stressing yourself unnecessarily. If you’ve done your best, then leave it to the Almighty. If something’s out of your hands, it deserves freedom from your mind too!  Overthinking is not going to change it. Let Him work it out for you. Be prepared for the best outcome!

label: human
text: Big changes can be made in small steps. If you want the change to last, then you need more than a "just do it" mentality. It needs to be slowly cultivated till it becomes part of you. Then pray hard & ask the Almighty to guide you. If anyone can help, it's the One who made you!

label: human
text: Be wary of greed. And it’s not just about money. You can be greedy for material possessions, fame, compliments etc. Whatever it is, greed is a spiritual disease of the heart and is always destructive. So work on your heart to drive greed out. Learn to share, give generously!

label: human
text: The Almighty’s not only the source of love but the only One truly worthy of love! People will always let us down. Impermissible relationships will end in heartbreak. That’s why when we give them our hearts completely, we end up suffering heartbreak after heartbreak! Take heed!

label: human
text: Do you live your life to please others? If so, you’ll never know peace because nothing you do will be good enough. If you make decisions based on what others will think of you, it’s time for a rethink! Where does the Almighty figure in your life? Reflect! Live your life for Him

label: human
text: Life is really not that complicated. You reap what you sow. You get what you give. Whatever you’re criticising in others, exists in you. If you’ll only recognise it. So treat life well. What goes around comes around. Make sure you give goodness, kindness & all things positive!

label: human
text: Remember, Satan works the hardest when you’re about to make a breakthrough. You need to hold on to your faith, stay the course & draw yourself even closer to the Almighty. Resist the temptation, ignore the whispers; keep fighting. Build a barrier by seeking refuge in your Maker!

label: human
text: Go out of your way to become a humble person. Yes! Cultivate humility. Do it with a passion. Life will test you with anything & everything. It’s easy to be humble when being tested & trying to cope. But staying humble when the Almighty’s blessed you reveals your true self!

label: human
text: Almighty. We pray for those suffering in the world today. May the poor & vulnerable have sufficient access to their basic needs. May those who have lost homes & loved ones be treated with mercy & compassion. Replace their panic with peace & despair with hope! Aameen.

label: human
text: Whenever we find something that irritates us about others, it’s time to look inward, scrutinise ourselves. The tendency is to look outward. Resist the temptation. Remember, your reaction is about you. Your bias, your judgement, your prejudice. You’ll end up hurting yourself.

label: human
text: Nothing lasts. The same goes for people who come into your life to show you a thing or two. Remember, no one crosses your path unless it’s planned by the Almighty. It doesn’t happen by accident. So cherish the moments you have with them because not everyone will stay forever.

label: human
text: Learn to listen to your own voice; your own heart; your own soul. Focus on that regardless of what others might tell you. Why? Because there’s too much noise around us, loud decibels accosting us daily. Sadly, people tend to listen to all that noise instead of themselves!

label: human
text: Don’t be jealous when you see someone having more than you. Remember, the Almighty blesses us differently. Don’t compare. Instead show gratitude so He can bless you with even more. Never forget that He has given you so much already; honestly, you’ll never be able to count them!

label: human
text: Do you feel angry or resentful when being corrected or shown the truth? If you do, then you have a problem with pride! Be wary because even a atom’s weight of it can bar you from Paradise! So work on your heart. Purify it. Humble yourself to people. Get rid of self-importance!

label: human
text: Some people feel a little lost when they don’t get enough attention from others. So they make fun of people, belittle them and say nasty things about them in order to get the attention they so badly desire. Try to counsel them if you can. Say a prayer for them. They need it!

label: human
text: Remember, the Almighty does not expect us to have all the answers. He knows, as humans, our knowledge is limited. But that’s no excuse for not seeking knowledge. He expects us to learn; have unwavering faith in Him; knowing that He’s always there & that He rewards those who try!

label: human
text: Do you often feel confused & unsettled? Perhaps your heart feels like something’s amiss? Learn to cultivate inner peace by drawing yourself closer to the Almighty. Trust Him completely. He will guide you through it all. He will show you where you need to go to feel whole again!

label: human
text: Don’t be foolish and expose every blessing the Almighty has given you to everyone and think that they’ll be happy for you. The truth is some will but many won’t. The evil eye is real. Learn to keep things private and not to share too much with those who could possibly harm you.

label: human
text: If you’re always looking for ways to expose others, you have a problem that needs fixing. Remember, the Almighty said if you expose others, He’ll surely expose you, even if you’re hiding in the tiniest corner of the room. If you have good intentions, do it privately not publicly!

label: human
text: Whatever you’re facing right now, whatever you’re dealing with won’t last. Nothing does. So get a perspective on life. Things will get better. That’s the Almighty’s promise. Tomorrow brings new hope. Daybreak will happen. Get hold of yourself and keep moving. You’ll get there!

label: human
text: You’re allowed to disagree with others, state your opinion respectfully but NEVER get physical or violent. This quality makes us distinct from animals! Be civilised, listen to what others are saying but avoid knee-jerk reactions. It would save you from a whole lot of regret!
